Name: Rainy Day Racer
About the game: Rainy Day Racer is a 3D time-attack motor racing game set in a Scottish city where it rains all the time, all the time, just absolutely hammers it down every effing day. Featuring: Arcadey, forgiving handling physics, with no collision damage and gently railroaded drifting Leaderboards and downloadable ghosts to chase 3 vehicles, including a quality transit van 3 courses (one bit is shared between two courses, so maybe more like 2.8 courses) 1 beautiful woman model who'll twirl and hold up a sign with your name on it if you set a good record
